subject: Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
Automobile Racing
Camps and Camping
lead_paragraph: Some fans of the Indianapolis 500 are, for the first time, spending race weekend camped out in luxurious tents on the speedway’s infield.
snippet: Some fans of the Indianapolis 500 are, for the first time, spending race weekend camped out in luxurious tents on the speedway’s infield.
